title: 254: Mind Pump Goes Keto
description: The Mind Pump Crew has been experimenting with the ketogenic diet and are intrigued. Although there seems to be many benefits to eating this way it is important to know that the ketogenic diet is NOT the officially recommended diet of Mind Pump. In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin explore the ins and outs of eating this way. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpmedia.com
